mapper.insert:
insert ignore into coc_clan_war_members (member_tag,member_name, war_tag, clan_tag, attack_time_left) values
(#{item.memberTag}, #{item.memberName},#{item.warTag}, #{item.clanTag}, #{item.attackTimeLeft})
mapper.select: select ccwm.*,ccw.is_league_war from coc_clan_war_members ccwm join coc_clan_wars ccw on ccwm.war_tag = ccw.tag where ccwm.clan_tag = #{clanTag} and ccwm.war_tag = #{warTag} and ccwm.member_tag in (#{defenderTag}, #{attackerTag}) group by ccwm.member_tag;
mapper.update: update coc_clan_war_members set attack_no_star_time = #{member.attackNoStarTime}, attack_one_star_time = #{member.attackOneStarTime}, attack_two_star_time = #{member.attackTwoStarTime}, attack_three_star_time = #{member.attackThreeStarTime}, attack_time_used = #{member.attackTimeUsed}, attack_time_left = #{member.attackTimeLeft}, defense_no_star_time = #{member.defenseNoStarTime}, defense_one_star_time = #{member.defenseOneStarTime}, defense_two_star_time = #{member.defenseTwoStarTime}, defense_three_star_time = #{member.defenseThreeStarTime}, total_defense_time = #{member.totalDefenseTime}, total_attack_star = #{member.totalAttackStar}, total_defense_star = #{member.totalDefenseStar} where id = #{member.id}
mapper.select: select ccwm.clan_tag as clan_tag, ccwm.member_tag as member_tag, sum( ccwm.attack_no_star_time ) AS attack_no_star_time, sum( ccwm.attack_one_star_time ) AS attack_one_star_time, sum( ccwm.attack_two_star_time ) AS attack_two_star_time, sum( ccwm.attack_three_star_time ) AS attack_three_star_time, sum( ccwm.defense_no_star_time ) AS defense_no_star_time, sum( ccwm.defense_one_star_time ) AS defense_one_star_time, sum( ccwm.defense_two_star_time ) AS defense_two_star_time, sum( ccwm.defense_three_star_time ) AS defense_three_star_time, sum( ccwm.attack_time_left ) AS attack_time_left, sum( ccwm.attack_time_used ) AS attack_time_used, sum( ccwm.total_attack_star ) AS total_attack_star, sum( ccwm.total_defense_star ) AS total_defense_star, sum( ccwm.total_defense_time ) AS total_defense_time, ccw.is_league_war FROM coc_clan_war_members ccwm JOIN coc_clan_wars ccw on ccwm.war_tag = ccw.tag and ccwm.clan_tag = ccw.clan_tag WHERE ccw.season = #{season} GROUP BY ccw.is_league_war, ccwm.clan_tag, ccwm.member_tag
